Question 9
                                  
 
 
A column with one end fixed and one end free has a critical buckling load of 100 N. For the same column 
if free end is replaced with a pinned end then critical buckling load will be ______ N (round off to the 
nearest integer).
Strength of Material (Theory of Column) 
 
Ans. 
800
